title: wine_Fulcrum_2008_Gap's_Crown_Vineyard_Pinot_Noir_(Sonoma_Coast)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 51374.
country: US.
description: Big and powerful, but nuanced despite its size. It's a dark, extracted wine, filled with wild cherry, raspberry, currant and sandalwood flavors, as well as exotic notes of forest balsam, grilled mushrooms, tamari and dusty Indian spices. Super-complex, it changes with every sip, and should change interestingly over the next six years. The vineyard is in the Petaluma Gap, and argues strongly for that region's future..
designation: Gap's Crown Vineyard.
